title: IISER Pune Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 07 Project Manager and Other Posts
description: Indian Institute of Science Education and Research (IISER) Pune has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Manager, Teaching Associate, Teaching Assistant, and Administrative Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified for Ph.D, Post Graduation, B.E/ B.Tech., 12th can grab this chance and apply for the IISER Pune Recruitment 2025 . Here, we included the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and ho...
